Control Name: SI-7 (13) CODE EXECUTION IN PROTECTED ENVIRONMENTS
Control Statement: The organization allows execution of binary or machine-executable code obtained from sources with limited or no warranty and without the provision of source code only in confined physical or virtual machine environments and with the explicit approval of [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].
